name: neurointel-ai-os
description: Futuristic Cyber-Clinical AI Operating System for Neuro-Imaging

scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend

author: Vikram Kumar
